trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Crestline
There were no other sightings in Crestline on or around June 14th 2012
divs: sighting detailsi was on my porch, it was day time,a nice day. i saw it first slightly above the trees from south west to north east. it had 2 dark lines in it verticaly segmenting its tube shape, into equal parts,squared off on the ends.it hah lights that apeared ball shaped that ran from the front to the rear then front to rear again and again. it apeared to glow yellow white.i tried to get binoculars to get a better veiw but it was gone. ive seen this same object on ufo documentaries\one in colerado.
Summary: cylinder divided into equal portions verticaly by dark lines with yellow white lights alternating from front to back,repeatedly till gone
